attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To bring forward to the earliest date possible the re-introduction of the link between the state pension and average earnings for all pensioners but especially for those over 75 years of age.

rejection.details: Petition main sentence reads is currently petitioning the PM “...to Robert Chaplin”. This will need to be redrafted.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
